ComicInfo.Summary: After battling the Martian forces on Earth and on Mars, Dragon becomes the victim of a sneak attack by Vicious Circle agents Chaos and Control, who manage to beat him senseless, leaving him lying at the feet of Cyberface and the rest of the Vicious Circle.
